XVision Compound List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
  • _rowvec (The class _rowvec is a data structure used to implement checking on 2nd matrix index. A matrix is essentially a column vector of _rowvecs)
  • XV2Vec (Template class for a 2d vector)
  • XVAffineMatrix (XVAffineMatrix)
  • XVAffineWarp (Class for with 2x2 affine matrix)
  • XVColorBase (Base class for color images?)
  • XVColorImage (The purpose of this class is to allow implicit conversions between different image types, when such a conversion is required)
  • XVColVector (XVColVector class For specifics on the member functions here, see the XVMatrix class from which this is derived. Basically, XVRowVector is a horizontal matrix, while XVColVector is a vertical matrix)
  • XVDiagonalMatrix (Diagonal Matrix Class A diagonal matrix is basically a XVColVector with support to multiply by ordinary matrices in the appropriate fashion. All of the member functions are explained in the Matrix class (most are just adapted versions of those from the Matrix class anyway))
  • XVDisplayGroupTracker (XVDisplayTracker)
  • XVDisplayTracker (XVDisplayTracker)
  • XVDrawable (Provides methods for drawing/filling/coloring objects in XVDrawWindows)
  • XVDrawColor (Color class for XVDrawObjects)
  • XVDrawEllipse (Class for drawing an ellipse in XVWindows)
  • XVDrawEllipseX (Ellipse object for XVDrawWindowX)
  • XVDrawLine (Class for drawing a line in XVWindows)
  • XVDrawLineX (Line object for XVDrawWindowX)
  • XVDrawObject (Base class for drawable objects)
  • XVDrawObjectX (Base class for objects that are drawable in any XVDrawWindowX)
  • XVDrawPoint (Class for drawing a point in XVWindows)
  • XVDrawPointX (Point object for XVDrawWindowX)
  • XVDrawRect (Class for drawing a rectangle in XVWindows)
  • XVDrawRectX (Rectangle object for XVDrawWindowX)
  • XVDrawString (Class for drawing text in XVWindows)
  • XVDrawStringX (String object for XVDrawWindowX)
  • XVDrawWindow (Template class for windows that allow drawing inside them)
  • XVDrawWindowX (Subclass of XVWindowX that has basic shape drawing functionality)
  • XVEdge (XVEdge class declaration This is a simple, fast, signed edge with a -1, 1 mask)
  • XVException (Base class for an XVision exception)
  • XVGroupTracker (XVGroupTracker)
  • XVHueRangeTable (The HueRangeTable class allows for fast lookup to find the hue of a given RGB value The table holds boolean values: true if the hue of the RGB pixel was within the desired range, false otherwise)
  • XVHueSectorTable (The HueSectorTable class builds a table of the RGB to Sector (Hue Sector) values)
  • XVHueSeg (The XVHueSectorSeg class does Segmentation based on the Hue Sectors of the image)
  • XVImageBase (Base templated class for images)
  • XVImageException (Exception class for XVImages)
  • XVImageGeneric (Very basic definition (non-templated) of an image)
  • XVImageHSI (Class for HSI images)
  • XVImageHSV (Class for HSV images)
  • XVImageRGB (Class for RGB images)
  • XVImageScalar (Defines an image with scalar operations)
  • XVImageYUV (Class for YUV images)
  • XVImageYUV422 (Class for YUV422 images)
  • XVInteractive (Class providing methods for selecting items/regions of XVInteractWindows)
  • XVInteractWindowX (Subclass of XVDrawWindowX that allows for user interaction (selection of objects))
  • XVIterator (XVImageIterator is a class which encapsulates the pointer logic for iterating across images)
  • XVLine (Line class for XVision)
  • XVList (Linked list class, uses XVNodes as list elements)
  • XVLookupTableException (XVLookupTable)
  • XVMaskedImage (Defines a masked image class This class is templated on the actual underlying image while the 8-bit mask is carried along inside this class (inherited))
  • XVMaxEdge (XVMaxEdge class declaration This is a simple, fast, unsigned edge that finds the max column of an image)
  • XVMotionSeg (Does Segmentation based on the motion of the image)
  • XVNode (XVnode class)
  • XVOmniWarper (Unwarps images obtained by omni-camera)
  • XVPattern (XVPattern<T>)
  • XVRemoteWindowX (The purpose of this XVRemoteWindowX class is to provide an additional layer for drawing on a remote X display)
  • XVRGBConversionTable (XVRGBConversionTable)
  • XVRGBDistanceSeg (Does Segmentation based on the distance between the colors in the image and some predefined color)
  • XVRGBDistanceTable (The RGBDistanceTable class allows for fast lookup to find the distance between any color and a given color)
  • XVRGBTable (XVRGBTable)
  • XVRowVector (XVRowVector class For specifics on the member functions here, see the XVMatrix class from which this is derived. Basically, XVRowVector is a horizontal matrix, while XVColVector is a vertical matrix)
  • XVScalarRangeSeg (Segmentation based on scalar range values)
  • XVScalarRangeTable (Fast lookup table for scalar range values)
  • XVScalarTable (XVScalarTable)
  • XVSegmentation (The XVSegmentation takes images and does segmentation based on some user specified operation)
  • XVShortEdge (XVShortEdge class declaration This is a simple, fast signed edge of length one)
  • XVSize (A section of data)
  • XVSSD (XVSSD)
  • XVSSDStepper (XVSSDStepper)
  • XVStatePair (XVStatePair)
  • XVStateWindowX (Subclass of XVDrawWindowX that allows user to obtain state of window at a moment in time -> has access to all objects drawn in window, etc)
  • XVThreadedWindowX (Subclass of XVStateWindowX that allows window to be run in separate thread)
  • XVThresholdTable (Fast lookup table for thresholds, used to make XVMotionSeg)
  • XVTracker (XVTracker)
  • XVTrackerException (XVFeature.h)
  • XVVideo (Base class for all Video Devices of the System Video is designed to provide a generic front end to video sources)
  • XVWindow (Template class for windows)
  • XVWindowX (Base class for all windows used in X)
  • XVYUVConversionTable (XVYUVConversionTable)
  • XVYUVTable (XVYUVTable)
